description: Tama Hime Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Tama Hime') is a stunning and eye-catching addition to any garden or landscape. Known for its vibrant foliage, this maple is prized for its intense deep warm orange and yellow colors in spring and summer turning to shades of brilliant red and orange in the fall. Compact in size yet wide in its beauty, this maple is easily manageable with a slow growth rate and low maintenance. Boasting an upright pyramidal shape and cascading branches, this slow-growing tree adds drama, style and color to any location and looks great year round. Tama Hime Japanese Maple is an excellent choice for those wanting to make a statement in their garden.
